Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 103 off 97 balls
Kuldeep Yadav trapped Tanzid Hasan lbw
Rahul took a diving catch to send Litton Das back for three runs
Mehidy Hasan Miraz was promoted but wicketkeeper Rahul took a diving catch to his left and sent him back for three runs
Shubman Gill scored his maiden World Cup half-century off 52 balls
Virat Kohli and Shreyas Iyer added 46 runs off 59 balls for the fourth wicket
Virat Kohli scored a century off 74 balls for the fourth wicket
Virat Kohli and Shreyas Iyer added an unbeaten 83 runs off 74 balls for the fourth wicket
Bangladesh never got a sniff after Kohli took over charge of the innings
Bangladesh top-scorer Mahmudullah guided the lower-order and scored 46 off 36 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli said it was a special feeling to play the tournament in India
Rohit Sharma said there is nothing major to worry about Pandya's injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's MCA Stadium was at full capacity with 33,610 fans
Bangladesh's stand-in skipper Najmul Hossain Shanto was dismissed for eight runs
Bangladesh's veteran Mushfiqur Rahim stabilized the innings with 38 off 46 balls
Bangladesh's Mahmudullah hit three fours and three sixes
India's Rohit Sharma and Shubman Gill added 88 off 76 balls
